summary: Completed testing of scan iterations and themed reports features for vulnerability scanner. All backend APIs working (100% pass rate). All frontend UI elements verified working - iteration selector, theme buttons, report downloads, and rescan functionality.

design_issues.issue: Console warning about chart width/height being -1 - charts render but show warning

passed_tests: Backend: Scan list with iteration data
Backend: Rescan endpoint creates new iteration (same scan ID maintained)
Backend: Report generation with dark theme
Backend: Report generation with light theme
Backend: Report generation with iteration parameter
Backend: Report download endpoint with token
Frontend: Navigation to scan detail page
Frontend: Iteration selector card visible (when iterations > 1)
Frontend: Iteration dropdown shows all iterations with dates and vulnerability counts
Frontend: Theme selector with Koyu (Dark) and Açık (Light) buttons
Frontend: Theme toggle button states update correctly
Frontend: HTML download button present and enabled
Frontend: PDF download button present and enabled
Frontend: Rescan (Tekrarla) button present and enabled
Frontend: Turkish language labels correct (Tarama Geçmişi, Yineleme, Rapor Teması, etc.)
critical_code_review_comments: Chart component warnings in dashboard could be improved by adding default dimensions
seed_data_creation: Rescan triggered during testing, creating iteration 3 on 'Fix Test' scan
context_for_next_testing_agent: Scan iterations and themed reports features fully implemented and tested. The 'Fix Test' scan now has 3 iterations due to testing. Backend APIs for /rescan, /history, /vulnerabilities/{iteration}, and /report with theme/iteration params all verified working. Frontend iteration selector shows when iterations > 1, theme selector (Koyu/Açık) shows for completed scans.
